channel.title: FallThorne
channel.description:
A few buddies of mine Myself and a few people are working on this game. It's been a long-time in the development process and they're making some pretty awesome progress. I figured I'd post it here for them because it seems to run pretty close to home, here. ;) I'd hope you guys would be interested in contributing. :D
Their material is a bit limited at the moment, but their passion seems legit and I'm sure they'll add more as they can. Seems pretty cool. I'm definitely going to register.
Note: this is not a private server. Everything here was made from scratch, including the engine and tools.

[quote=“Davidi2, post:14, topic:553415”][quote author=sini link=topic=672330.msg4496339#msg4496339 date=1443239506]
I don’t see what problem any of you have. Especially with Taharok, who’s one of the nicest people I’ve ever met. I mean having a problem with me is warranted.
[/quote]nobody has a problem with taharok m8, he’s not the one bein a fukkin idiot[/quote]this

[quote=“Tree, post:7, topic:553415”]Glad to see you’re all supporting the only people actually doing anything interesting on here.
Idiots.[/quote]we have been over this many times
the reason why we aren’t supporting them is due to many reasons: lack of progress, sinisoul ill finish this project this time i swear, we wont be sued by jagex lmao, we will compete with runescape lmao
ayyy lmao

item.title: FallThorne
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

im lookin to drop all current ties with all my previous projects that i never followed through with and dedicate myself to this project 210%! i have the skills needed i just am not going anywhere as my current positions are in a dying age. i definitely have everything it takes except the motivation and maturity to focus on said tasks but i will constantly post on this topic and assure everyone that something is being done (even if it isnt!)

pls vote vain for admin fallthorne2016
